website_summaries.verdict: A genuine leather crossbody bag at a budget price in 4 color options.
pros: This leather-made crossbody features a main compartment and 4 outer zippered pockets for storing things within easy reach
Bag strap is adjustable and although the bag looks small, it's fully capable of fitting the basics, including a book
Front of the bag features a built-in wallet
cons: Has a strong leather smell that lingers for a while

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: this is honestly the best purchase I've ever made!! I bought it to take on a trip to California so I didn't have to take my wristlet, and I ended up being able to fit a book, a charger, headphones, money, cards, change, Chapstick, and a bunch of other odds and ends things!! I could not believe my whole book fit inside the purse, there is sooooo much room in it, even though it is soo small!!!! it doesn't smell like mildew at all, but it does smell like genuine leather. this is a 10/10 buy and I would definitely purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upside Down Credit Cards Pockets
customer_reviews.text: I'm still putting my stuff inside the bag, so I'm not sure hue irbil work out, but I immediately have a comment to make about the 3 credit card pockets. The pockets are upside down do i can't put cards in two of them and the cards slip out of the one I am able to use. Very disappointing because I need to use those pockets! I guess I will have to place all my cards in the ID pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Nice cross body purse
customer_reviews.text: Cute & convenient leather cross body purse I appreciate how it has 6 pockets and one with slots for credits cards & license. It's perfect for me for when I take my daughter to the parks etc.. to carry my keys & iPhone 6s Plus (described for size). Although it's a small purse it's big enough to also carry a 16oz bottle of water & a small sippy cup for my daughter in it. The strap is adjustable. Can be made short or long. The color is more or less passable w/anything I wear but I do wish it came in different colors to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Luz360

customer_reviews.title: A multitasking little purse!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this, is my new companion when I go for a walk or to do something with my children in the weekends. This purse have a lot of zipper pockets, like 4 in the front and 1 in the back, the material event though is not real leather, is a good quality material and doesn't have that funny smell I've read that others purses have. The strap is very comfortable and I can resize it. The front pocket have credit cards and ID spots, so convenient. This is nice to keep your phone, keys, make-up, credit cards and IDs on the go!​
customer_reviews.author: KIKUSA

customer_reviews.title: So much room for activities!
customer_reviews.text: I love how many pockets it has, and that the front pocket doubles as a mini wallet. Tonight, I was able to fit three muffins, a baked potato, and a parking citation in it. This is now my every day purse.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purse to kick it around Paris. Absolutely perfect! The only thing that would make it better would be a pocket for a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawal

customer_reviews.title: Dropped the Ball
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know where to begin. I guess let's start with the fact that it's not real leather. Secondly, it smells so horrible, that no one can possibly take this purse anywhere and not smell like a cheap product made in China. Lastly, it arrived with one of the zippers broken! I'm warning whoever is reading this review, do not, repeat, do not buy this purse. Sorry seller, but you dropped the ball on this one!
customer_reviews.author: stacyleigh303

customer_reviews.title: Something small and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purse for my mother as a gift and so far it is holding up. If you are looking for a place to put a long length pocket book I would say this purse is a bit small for that but if you have a small wallet and just a few extra things than you would definitely like this one. My mother likes the adjustable straps and the leather design with multiple pockets. I think if you are looking for something nice but also discrete than this is the purse for you. My mother has put it under her coat in bad neighborhood to prevent robbery and with a big winter coat you can't even tell.
customer_reviews.author: AmberTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: The initial dye smell, as warned by other posters, was off-putting. I put it in a Rubbermaid container with some coffee beans and stowed it in the freezer for a few days, then hung it in the garage for a day or so. The result was a handy little purse that smelled like leather and coffee. The strap might not last for years and years, but the zippers and clasps are good, it almost has too many pockets, and it fits my wallet and cell phone perfectly. Nice for travel or anytime that wearing a cross-body purse can leave you one less thing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag itself
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag itself, but what is carefully obscured in ALL the photos is how the strap is attached - it feeds through the second loop and both ends attach on one side. This matters because it makes the top of the bag pucker, a nuisance to unzip and zip. I'm going to cut and refasten mine myself, as I have the tools to do it, but others might need to take it to a leather worker and poof, there goe$$ your cheap bag.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This purse is adorable and just the perfect size for travel. Unfortunately, mine arrived with a slice in the leather which makes me think it wouldn't hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Great little purse
customer_reviews.text: I stopped carrying purses 5 years ago & carried a wallet that my phone could fit into. But, I wanted to be able to start carrying a planner, & my essential oils, so I decided I would try a little purse. This is PERFECT! I can fit my business cards, credit cards, chap-stick, band-aids, hair ties, check book, 4 essential oil bottles, a small planner, 4 pens, a small bottle of asprin, a small bottle of hand sanitizer, 2 phones & my headphones in it! Which is way more than what I used to carry, but I figure now I am a bit more prepared.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Zipper separates.
customer_reviews.text: I so loved this. However the zipper keeps breaking and coming undone. & do not stuff this I only use it for a phone and chapstick and a credit card. And have used it on maybe 4 occasions. It's too late to return it I have owned it for almost 2 'months
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing bag! Has 3 zippered areas on front including ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bag! Has 3 zippered areas on front including a card pouch with 4 CC slots & a 5th one with clear cover for DL. It also has a large zippered center area and a zippered slot on the back. I am now on oxygen 24-7 & so carry a portable 02 supply usually over my left shoulder (where I normally placed my purse strap) carrying 2 just did NOT work. This works fantastic. I can carry cards, $, my insurance cards, phone, & have room for much more. LOVE, LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Jankiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Cute little crossbody
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bag. It is small, yet it holds more than any crossbody I've ever had in the past. I can easily fit my Galaxy phone, a hair brush, a compact, lipstick, an ID and several credit cards, and it doesn't look "stuffed." The color is a reddish brown or dark burgundy that will go with mostly everything, and the quality is better than expected for the price. Although it is advertised as "genuine leather" be aware that it isn't -- it is a pretty good quality faux leather that doesn't scream plastic. The only thing that could be improved is the strap, which looks and feels cheaper than the bag itself.
customer_reviews.author: Florida22

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but too small
customer_reviews.text: The purse is too small for my needs. I ordered this purse in tan, dark brown and black. The black purse is not eligible for return. I knew I was pushing it to fit an iPad2 even without the case. I also needed it large enough to hold a steno pad. Neither item will fit. The phone pocket is large enough for my phablet with it's case. I would recommend the purse if you need a small cross body purse if you're going somewhere you only need a couple of credit cards, a comb, touch up make-up, phone and id, like dancing or an amusement park.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great little purse
customer_reviews.text: The purse is actually as described. It holds my IPhone 6. I have too many credit cards, so I only keep the ones I use all the time in the handy outside organizer. The others I banded and put in one of the other pockets. I read other reviews about zipper problems, but don't know if they over filled it. I'm hoping I will not have that problem at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels sturdy, great size, and someone finally got the straps right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother because her old purse's strap was frayed. I chose this because the leather part that connects the purse itself to the strap comes out the top of the purse, as opposed to the side. My engineering education tells me leather and seams prefers to be in tension rather than shear -- basically, top is better than side. So I bought this with durability in mind. She loves it! It's genuine leather and is just the right size for her needs. I will add to its longevity if it becomes an issue but it looks and feels very sturdy. Best of all, the "new leather" smell is unequivocally loved!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag,great deep cordovan color, Bon Voyage!!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, deep cordovan. Lots of pockets that are big enough to use, all but back deep phone pocket have zippers. Strap for me is long enough for a comfortable cross body and can be adjusted to shorter lengths as well. Overall appears well made, arrived packaged and new, shipping date was right on target. Mine appears to be leather, not PU as expected after reading other reviews. After my next 2 months traveling in S.E. Asia I will definitely update with the practical stuff I discover. Bon Voyage!
customer_reviews.author: Susan James

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: I was uncertain about its quality but gave it a try. When it arrived with the zipper on the front lower compartment broken, I decided to return and not replace. No way is it really leather, but it looks just like the photo. If you receive one with the zippers working, the small size and compartments may be convenient and you'll have a cute bag. Three years ago a bought one like it in Florence which is a bit smaller, that is holding up well, but these bags are not of that quality. For the price I guess that is to be expected,
customer_reviews.author: Rose byAnother Name

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this purse. I'm a frequent traveler and the size is perfect for light weight, shoulder/Cross body carrying; placing in larger "personal", under seat plane storage. It doesn't smell as others have experienced. Capacity is adequate for everyday use and travel. holds cell phone safely outside the purse, pockets for keys, multipe glasses, secured money pocket, room for makeup, passport, etc.. Might like to have had a zippered pocket in the main chamber, but no problem. Arrived 5 days earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The stap broke 2 days after final return date. Liked all the storage in this purse but cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At last the perfect pocket book
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a small well made purse for a long long time. This is small, light and fits everything my big Queen Elizabeth purse held with room to spare. I have a Iphone 6x plus and a battery pack....no problem. Two lipsticks a comb and a mirror with room to spare. Its because you dont need a separate wallet. No odor, made of good leather, straps seem sturdy. I liked it so much I bought another for 12 bucks. Woohoo a bargain at twice the price. kmg
customer_reviews.author: kathyg

customer_reviews.title: So many pockets - love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it has so many pockets but I love it. I like using crossbags and this one is awesome. I could put a lot of things in it and it came as I expected. It has a good quality too since there's no tear and I checked all the zippers and sewing. It's looks really nice and reliable. I could out my make up, cards, passport and the likes. 😁
customer_reviews.author: abalangpinay

customer_reviews.title: I have given these bags to friends and family and they love them. I get compliments on the bag everywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these bags over the past 6 years (I think). I have given these bags to friends and family and they love them. I get compliments on the bag everywhere I go. The credit card/document holder is the best part because you do not need a wallet. It's all there in it's convenient pouches. I can go anywhere hands free because it has the adjustable strap for over the body carrying. I plan on getting another one soon since the straps wear out. I've had this particular bag approximately 3 years; which is probably a long time for a purse or handbag for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: I think it will suit my needs
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little bag with lots of compartments and I think it will work ok for me. Haven't had time yet to fill it up. I wanted it for travelling so I would not have to carry a large purse. Even though I read the measurements on this bag, I guess I thought it would be little larger than it is. It looks nice and is soft and will fit into my flight bag if need be.
customer_reviews.author: MarieC

customer_reviews.title: Awful Smell, ugly zippers The beige is much darker than image.
customer_reviews.text: Zippers ugly and conspicuous, lining too short, smells terribly of chemicals, does not feel like leather, maybe it is, maybe not. The tag is obviously leather.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn stewart-mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: My GoTo Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag from this company. The first I bought 2 years ago for a trip to Paris. It's lightweight and holds an amazing amount of stuff, including my Kindle. I loved this hand free bag so much, I continued using it after I returned. It's starting to show a little wear from daily use, so I ordered one in a different color to start breaking it in. I should probably get a few to bank them for the future!
customer_reviews.author: Sonora

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PURSE!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're teetering on the decision of buying this as I was, know that the quality is superb. Rarely in life have I spent so little and received so much. This is a real leather purse with amazing workmanship with the zippers and stitching. I hate monkeying with a purse that falls off my shoulder and I have to babysit. I can put this cross body purse on and not think about it. My phone and wallet are secure. I think it will wear really well. So glad I got it! Only wish there were more color choices, because this is my go-to purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Starr

customer_reviews.title: Roma Leathers Genuine Cross body Purse Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Roma cross body bag I've ordered. I carried my first one everyday. It's small, light weight, easy on the shoulder. I have several bags and purse, big and small but, this one is perfect for me. With all the compartments it holds every thing I need to carry. There is no other bag like this one. I have worn the first one completely out from carrying it everyday. I would recommend it to anyone. I hope you will always keep this in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Compact!
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft leather organizer. It holds all my essentials for a day out: whether at work or going to eat out or a quick trip to the store. I can fit my glasses (in a soft case) and my iPhone in one pocket. Cards, license, cash and keys in another pocket. Makeup stuff in another pocket. Purse pack Kleenex and small miscellaneous items in another. The handle is good to use as a cross body purse. It has been my favorite go-to purse since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Balbir Kaur Thind

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this cross-body purse a day ago. I needed to carry wallet stuff, phone, keys, headphones plus have a place to carry dog treats I could get quick access to (didn't want a flap closure) when I'm taking my pup for a walk. This purse works great. I could actually add a few other small items if needed. It does appear to be genuine leather. It is no great beauty but at this price I don't expect that and it is reasonably nice looking. This it is very functional for my needs. I might even consider getting one in another color.
customer_reviews.author: mickymouth

customer_reviews.title: CUTE LITTLE LEATHER PURSE
customer_reviews.text: Used this purse while onboard a Caribbean cruise. It worked well for carrying small essentials through the cruise terminal during embarkation and disembarkation. Also handy for walking around the ship. I like the crossbody feature, which makes the purse feel more secure. The leather has softened to a nice feel after a week's worth of use. I do wish the zipper pulls felt heavier/sturdier...time will tell how the pulls stand up to use over time.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Nichols

customer_reviews.title: nice little purse
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little purse. It is as described EXCEPT that it is not 9 inches in length. It is only 8.75 inches. This is significant for me because I wanted to be able to put my Kindle, which is 8.5 inches, in it. That quarter of an inch matters. Other than that, it's quite nice. The strap adjusts easily and unkinks quickly. But debating if I'll keep it because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: SpringfieldSherry

customer_reviews.title: Cute and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second purse because I loved my brown one so much. It's perfect to hold everything I need and with the multitude of compartments, it makes it easy to find what I need. I like the crossbody strap, to keep the purse close to my body, keeping my hands free without worry of it falling off my shoulder. It's not heavy, so the then strap doesn't cut into your shoulder or neck. You'll be shocked at the amount of items you can put into this purse.
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Great purses will have to see how they hold up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the bag itself but I am very skeptical about PLASTIC ZIPPERS!! THEY BREAK TO EASILY!!!I had bought 2 from another company.One for a friend and 1 for me.Zippers broke on both purses they were Plastic+Company would not take them back and send me 2 more!! Ripoff!! I also had 2 with metal zippers and they were FANTASTIC! Could not find company where I bought the 2 others...So I saw your add and thought I would try you now!!!!THANK YOU!!! PERFECT SO FAR!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Dean

customer_reviews.title: lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: When ppl cry about it being small it made me laugh because it is suppose to be a smaller purse. I already had one this size but it did not have all the pockets and slots for organizing like this one does (and my old one was cheap material). I was skeptical about it being leather but it looks and smells like genuine leather (so it will last longer than my cheaply made DESIGNER purse) and I paid a lot less for it. So yes I would recommend this purse- just keep in mind it is not a big hand bag but a little purse with lots of organizational space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution for a weighty problem.
customer_reviews.text: I use an oxygen concentrator which I have to carry around. In addition, I have been using a tote bag to carry the normal contents of a purse plus the medications, nebulizer, and other essentials to keep me breathing. I needed a small but versatile bag to carry my wallet, phone, Kindle (truly an essential), and a couple of other items when I don't anticipate requiring everything in the tote bag. This purse is perfect. It has several zipper pockets as well as a perfectly sized pocket for my phone. My shoulders and back appreciate the shift in weight. This was an inspired purchase on my part.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed in the quality of the item
customer_reviews.text: I am a minimalist when it comes to purses, so I appreciated the small and simple design. I used the purse perhaps 1-2 times a week. Despite the exceedingly infrequent use and very light load (Only had my credit cards, driver's license, checkbook, and a small phone in it), it broke in under a month. The strap just snapped while walking. Really disappointed in the quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect small purse!
customer_reviews.text: This crossbody purse is exactly what i needed! I love it! I travel a lot and sometimes the events i go to require me to bring a big purse for supplies, but sometimes all i need is to carry a few things and be hands free! I absolutely love all the pockets and zippers this purse has. The only weirs thing is when i first got this product it had a strange, strong smell that gave me a headache. It lasted a couple days. Other than that, this purse does exactly.what its supposed to made from quality materials!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: we both really like the unique color & convenient phone pocket
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother in law, who absolutely loves it! I do too, we both really like the unique color & convenient phone pocket. When I showed her she was like, "Look at all the pockets!!" And it's real leather, at that price?! I want one too now!
customer_reviews.author: KaelahTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great purse!
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I thought it might be cheaply made. However, it is a really nice quality. I bought it after my doctor suggested I ditch my big heavy purse to help alleviate back pain. I've definitely gone through an adjustment period downsizing from a much larger purse. However, now that I have, it's kind of freeing not being saddled with a chunky bag. It is definitely nice to be able to just reach in and find my keys or phone in one of the pockets and not searching for them. I really like it, so much that I just ordered it in a second color!
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FANTASTIC BAG
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bag! Has 3 zippered areas on front including a card pouch with 4 CC slots & a 5th one with clear cover for DL. It also has a large zippered center area and a zippered slot on the back. I am now on oxygen 24-7 & so carry a portable 02 supply usually over my left shoulder (where I normally placed my purse strap) carrying 2 just did NOT work. This works fantastic. I can carry cards, $, my insurance cards, phone, & have room for much more. I LOVE it! Bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Jankiewicz

customer_reviews.title: It smells
customer_reviews.text: I love this little purse - holds everything I need when I go shopping. Problem is, it smells really bad - like musty and mildew. I thought I could clean it and put dryer sheets inside to get rid of the smell, but it hasn't worked. I've tried several cleaning products and it still smells bad. Also, the stitching on the strap has started to unravel. Would NOT recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deb-Smooth jazz lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bag. I bought this for my elderly mother. I hate when she shops with a large purse on her arm. She is a target. This purse is small enough for her to carry over her shoulder and under her arm. Yet it’s large enough to hold all of her things. It has many compartments. It’s beautiful genuine leather and mom loves it. I should have bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: For me....perfect!
customer_reviews.text: First...I do not carry my life in my purse..It is smallish...carrying credit cards..cash , coins, cell, check book, etc. I love the cross body feature...my other cross body purses are Too big to be comfortable. I feel like a horse with the feed bag hanging around my neck. Any women with a purse out running around needs to carry a cross body...Much safer. The leather is great. Time will tell how long it will last, but I am ordering another today...the price is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: nancy smith

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small, like a wallet
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. Way too small to put much in it at all. The leather wasn’t the greatest either. I thought it would be a bit larger but it definitely didn’t meet my needs. It wasn’t bad, it was just super tiny. Like for a child. If you’re looking for a passport, credit card wallet with a strap, then it would fit that need, but to carry any makeup, or other essentials, it just won’t fit that bill.
customer_reviews.author: Metal Raven Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love this purse!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse! First of all in my opinion it IS Genuine Leather, like it says (unlike what another reviewer said). It smelled like leather as soon as I opened it up and it still smells like leather after I've owned and used it for quite awhile. I wish it was slightly bigger thou, just a little bit. I like to carry my phone (one front Zipper), my keys change and cards (front bottom rounded pocket), my backup battery (back open pocket), mini bottle of pain pills-travel kleenex (top large zipper pocket). I only rated it 4* instead of 5* because a zipper broke.
customer_reviews.author: MarQuette Mason

customer_reviews.title: It has multiple zippered compartments including a non-zippered cell phone holder [a slit on the outside of the bag that allows for easy access to the phone w/o opening the bag itself]
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my mother, she loves it. It has multiple zippered compartments including a non-zippered cell phone holder [a slit on the outside of the bag that allows for easy access to the phone w/o opening the bag itself]. It's small size makes it very convenient to carry, especially useful if you are "traveling light" such as running errands or any time you don't require a larger "catch all" bag.
customer_reviews.author: Canis Latrans

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bag
customer_reviews.text: I was conflicted about buying this. A lot of people complained about the odor. I bought the black and it doesn’t have a bad smell. I don’t know if the color matters, but mine is fine. The size is accurate. There is a 3 card organizer with a place for ID. Lots of places to put stuff. The phone pocket is shallow, so I just put my phone inside. I can fit my essentials which is what I was looking for. The strap is sewn on and a bit thin. I don’t know how it will hold up, but it was less than $20 and I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mumbo

customer_reviews.title: Purse of Many Pockets
customer_reviews.text: This purse is perfect as far as size, many pockets, and weight. I've had it for over a month and it still smells slightly. The odor had diminished from when it was new. I did let it air out on my patio for a few days, which really helped. I think it's the dye that they used on the leather and the fact that they ship it in a sealed bag. But the overall design is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Agers

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and smelly!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item. The leather was pealing along the side and along the back were wear marks. This bag has a very noticeable odor as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Glasses AND Wallet Fit
customer_reviews.text: Very well made,exactly as pictured; good size for glasses and the lower front pocket has slots for a credit card. I got this for my husband (he is European Italian and is 5' 7" tall) who up until now, was putting everything in his cargo pants pocket. The cross body strap is plenty long for him and is adjustable, so taller folks would benefit as well. With this, he can wear plain jeans and a jacket for a striking European look ;) Unlike many other reviews, I did not find the leather smell unpleasant; I rather liked it. I definitely recommend this bag
customer_reviews.author: Julia Passamonti-Colamartino

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I recieved this bag! The leather is very good quality, soft and supple, the stitching is nicely done and the zippers are strong and put in very well! The number of pockets gives you plenty of room for whatever you need to take with you and the linings are strong and deep. The shoulder strap is easy to adjust and thick enough so that it won't break easily, but not so thick it's uncomfortable. A beautiful bag! I'm going to get a couple of more in different colors before they're all gone!
customer_reviews.author: Irindia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money, functional, lightweight but quality
customer_reviews.text: I think this is super quality for the money, wasnt sure what to expect....several pockets outside which are room enough for the average smart phone, keys and such that you want to get to, the dark brown is what I bought, its a nice shade, I like it and might buy another in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Christy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Quality, beautiful and very well made. Genuine leather
customer_reviews.text: Genuine leather, it is leather. I smell my leather to ensure that it is genuine. Yes it is! It does not have a strong smell at all. The label reads genuine leather and it is so beautiful. Love the different compartments to put my essentials in while out and about. This purse is beautiful, very well made and the size is perfect for whatever you want to put in it minus the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Ready2Shop

customer_reviews.title: So small won’t hold my phone!
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow is it small. Won’t even hold my cell phone! I can put my phone in the largest compartment but it won’t zip, my phone sticks out. But with my phone in there I can’t carry anything else I need, such as my keys, or asthma inhaler (that I have to use a lot because of severe asthma). So I’m returning it, hopefully without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bananah

customer_reviews.title: This purse smells like weed. Husband thought I was hiding some in this purse.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purse. I bought it to use at Cedar Point. Only reason I give it 3 stars is because it literally smells like weed. Especially if I am in my hot car or outside. I feel weird being in public with it because it smells like i'm walking around with a brick of pot in my purse. My husband thought I started smoking again and I havent smoked in over 10 years. I force all of my friends to smell it too and they agree. Do not get pulled over with this in your car... not that I am judging you if you do smoke... hahaha
customer_reviews.author: corinna miller

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need for vacation/travel
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks just as pictured - very attractive. I really like to all of the zip pockets! There was enough storage for my checkbook, phone, credit cards, keys, my powder make-up compact, and lip gloss. This was just what I needed. It seems to be very durable. I like it so much that I intend to buy another one. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: 1sexymama

customer_reviews.title: COLOR IS NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a purse like this that i use while traveling and it is awesome, perfect size. However, i ordered the wine (left) color and the purse pictured on the right is what i received. Nothing like the picture on line (pic on the right). Also the pic on-line shows a vertical seam on the front pocket, the one i received does not. Pic on-line is not accurate. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size - Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this little crossbody purse. It has several compartments with zippers, so that I can keep the items that I use organized. It is small, so it doesn't hold as much as a larger tote, but a perfect size to use when traveling, going out for the day or evening, etc. It's lightweight so it is easy to carry and doesn't hurt my shoulder or back. The price is very good for a leather mini-bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Youderian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value. The bag is leather and so soft. Perfect bag for traveling or just around town. I am truly surprised at the quality of the product for the price. Got the tan one and thinking of getting the black. Don’t hesitate to get if looking for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Loved purse until zippers came off after only 2 months of daily use
customer_reviews.text: This purse was the perfect size, perfect price point, had enough pockets and easy entry - excellent for traveling. Loved this purse until the zippers came off after only a couple of months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crossbody bag a lot, this is the third time I order this product. The first one I gave it to my sister because she loves it too, I am using the wine color crossbody everyday for 2 years and as you can see the sling started chipping but the body is still in perfect condition. Just recently got the black one. 10$ that will last you more than 2years of everyday use is a great product
customer_reviews.author: March

customer_reviews.title: Handy Purse!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for small bag that was tall but thin. I have a small space in my vicar to hide it. This purse is amazing! It has many well secured pockets, more than I expected. It can also holds my sunglasses, small hairbrush, and my large cell phone. Money and card holders. It's soft and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Poitras

customer_reviews.title: com as soon as Excellent..
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a blessing as well as my backpack for the excursions on the cruise and the tours in Orlando FL..fit well in the backpack (empty) ..just to take only what was needed Sierra Freewheel Backpack, True Navy We're currently processing your review and we will email you at r.l.sherrod49@gmail.com as soon as Excellent. ..Recovering from a torn meniscus (knee) Attended graduation and cruise successfully. After Spirit Airlines charged my $52.00 for one bag, had to comes up with a viable alternative. This is where this backpack came into the picture. Worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little purse at a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag for shopping. I’ve had similar in the past and although this one is a little on the small side, I can still get the basics in it. Can be worn crossbody very comfortably. I ordered it in beige and am pleased with the color. I think it’s a good purse for the price and am thinking about getting it in another color or two!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little purse
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for concerts, fairs, anywhere you just want to bring necessities. I've had mine for a long time and it's still holding up really well. If needed, it can be filled pretty full.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Elgethun

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: This bag is pretty awesome, as long as you don't have a lot of stuff to put in it. It has a LOT of compartments..and I loved that about it, but when you fill them up, the bag looks overstuffed and lumpy. The material is great...and I love the size, and the color. I will use it, but not for every-day.. It would be good, for me, at least, to use as a special purpose bag...to use when I'm just going on day trips to the store, etc. I would have given it 5 stars if the compartments expanded so that the bag didn't look like it has the mumps when filled. :)
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Best Organized Small Bag I have Found
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect small bag. I can carry all the essentials and they are well organized due to the different pockets. I saw my friends and ordered for myself. I now have two. Have not found a single thing I can criticize. I have a couple of Coach small bags and for practicality this is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Defective, missed return window
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this purse a year ago and it is holding up great. The cross body straps on her purse were attached through metal grommets. She loved it so much I decided to get one. They have changed the style slightly so that the straps are now sewn on. One week after the “return window” the straps are starting to pull away/rip off. Complete piece of junk and a waste of my money. Will cost more to have it repaired than the purse is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Loz1217

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits everything! I can put all the stuff I had in a MUCH larger bag into this cute, over the shoulder bag. Lipsticks, hairspray, money, credit cards, my phone, etc etc..It is so well made! It has lots of fantastic pockets and places to organize. It's a nice leather, I just can't say enough positive things about it. The price was amazing for such a quality purchase. I have had it for almost 6 months now. It looks brand new and I don't even need another purse.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. This crossbody is the perfect size to carry essentials. It's larger than wallet-size but smaller than medium-size. The front wallet holds cards and cash and is right at my fingertips. The leather is nice and soft. I purchased the light brown, which is a perfect match with my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon09

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for my daily purse needs.
customer_reviews.text: The pocket on the back fits my phone ( Pixel - not XL) securely; it's wide enough to fit a larger phone but it would stick out the top a bit. Lots of zippered spaces for organizing, strap easily goes across body. Material is nice and supple and feels reasonably durable. The small front pocket has places to insert credit-cards and the like, but I was able to (barely) squeeze a whole wallet into directly. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this bag. Classy looking, soft supple leather with plenty of pockets but still a small bag. I even have room for my kindle. The cross body design keeps it safe and secure. I bought the brown one but am thinking of ordering the black one as well. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Velma R. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT  MEDIUM SIZE CROSSBODY
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small cross body purse for vacations - especially cruises, where I do not want to carry a large purse on the ship or on land tours. This is perfect!!!! What a bargain, and it has FIVE zippered compartments plus another one that has deep compartment. It is "genuine leather" and well made. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. Some reviews said it had a weird smell, this one has a new leather smell which I like. I love this purse - just what I was looking for. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but more than adequate
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bags to replace one that I used for the past couple years. Of the two new ones, one had a slight defect where the stitching inside one pocket (adding in a credit card holder) was not secured. However, it does not affect the integrity of the purse. For the price, these leather cross body bags are great!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Just as Pucture ! Is Real Leather !
customer_reviews.text: I'm not One to Carry a Big Bag ! The Cross Over If you decided Wear It as Cross Over has a Nice Long Addustible Strap ! Nice Well Made Zippers ! Room for a I Phone 6 ! Billfold &, Lipstick Have in Main Zip Pocket It is a 4 ,,,,-6 In Billfold &, Thick alot Credit Cards in Change Part It is Very Thick ! Nice Billfoldni in Front I use it for my Keys very Secure Zipper & Compartments a little Notbook &, Pen has a Nice Slip.Pocket on Back ! Grest Little Purse ! Highly Recomend ☺
customer_reviews.author: henleygirl

customer_reviews.title: My Kindle Fire won't fit.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived timely, packaged well. Did not notice any offensive odors. Seems well made. I had downsized to a similar small purse bought locally, that did not hold up, so I bought this one to replace it. It is good for what it is, but I was a little disappointed. My Kindle will not fit in this bag, while it did just fit in the previous purse. The zippers and pockets seem a little undersized too. It is usable, and I certainly will get my money's worth, but the next time I buy, I will check the dimensions a little closer.
customer_reviews.author: Ellessay

customer_reviews.title: Crossbody handbag! Best kept secret!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this best secret been kept! It is a nice practical leather crossbody handbag! I do love that is has a wide enough pockets for my cell phone and other small items and make up! The strap is sturdy not thin. Highly recommend just make sure to air the handbag because upon opening has a strong leather scent but eventually goes away!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: 2 complaints
customer_reviews.text: This could have been a perfect small cross body bag except for two things 1. I am a plus sized woman so the strap was a little short to use as a crossbody. I like to have the bag at my hip and this came to my waist or just below. 2. The darn thing STUNK! Smelled like a combo of raw leather and mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cross body purse for every day use!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the cross body purse to use when my husband and I rode our motorcycle. After using the purse on a few rides, I realized it was perfect for every day use as well. I’ve always carried a big, heavy purse over my shoulder, which was so uncomfortable. Plus, I never felt my purse was safe in the shopping cart. Of course, I’ve had to downsize all the stuff I used to lug around but it is definitely worth it! The multiple pockets are just the right sizes for the things I really do need throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Keeling

customer_reviews.title: Great Purse!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. I always wear small crossbody purses, this one will be my favorite. Great for everyday. A lot of pockets, credit cards organizer, space for everything I need, including smart phone, cosmetics, paper napkins, keys - all woman's necessary items. Looks very stylish. Seems like good quality. Not sure if it is genuine leather or not, smells like leather... But for such a a low price - I don't really care as soon as it looks pretty good. Real leather or not - nobody will notice anyway. Ordered two colors - black and beige for summer time. Definitely will recommend it for every small crossbody's lover!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great purse, long strap!
customer_reviews.text: I purposely searched around for a crossbody purse with a long strap. I recently started using a cane and I don't like to deal with my purse on top of the cane. I'm also full figured and wanted a long enough strap so the purse sat comfortably just below my hip. I'm 5'5" and size 20 and this purse is perfect. I recommend it to anyone. It fits my phone, a small wallet and several other necessities just fine. The leather is soft and beautiful and quality. I know it'll last for years. It'll definitely be my choice for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: KJTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Commuting.
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size! I commute between DC and NYC, I put my ID, credit cards and metro/subway cards in the small front compartment. Cash and change/token holder on the next. My cell in the next and in the biggest compartment I put my kindle. Great! Then I can use my one hand to pull a roller carry on and a free hand to fend off whatever or to hold a bottle of water.....Will definitely buy in other colors. My friends are hinting they want one for their birthdays....hmmmm. I'm afraid if I order in another color I might just keep them to myself. I just might.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest and handiest crossbody bag and I'm very pleased with it, it was exactly what I was looking for and it is quite roomy, which surprised me as it measures approx. 8.5 in. tall by 6 in. wide. I purchased this bag primarily for vacation and have found my self continuing to carry it and it feels great not lugging around a huge bag and realizing I can survive with the "basics". The bag smells like 100% leather and I love that leather smell! I would recommend this bag to anyone looking for a great and roomy yet small crossbody bag. Also, the price was definitely right on!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: perfect for travel lightly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with just for traveling light your basic things needed. 1st pouch slots for licence 2nd & 3rd pouch have deep pockets for tissues, basic needs. 4th {top} deep pouch fits 2 pairs of sunglasses and or reading glasses with cases. In the back is a 5th deep pouch for change purse. 6th pouch doesnot have a zipper but perfect for my 4" by 6" cell phone
customer_reviews.author: Need to Know

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great little purse if not for the lining.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the purse and the outside material is fine, but I didn't care for the lining. It appears to be some sort of nylon that is a loose fitting and balloons inside the purse kind of like a trashbag does in a trashcan if you have air between the two. You basically have to dig around in this to find anything you put in your purse and it makes a crackling noise. This purse will probably just sit in my closet and never be used because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: great purse
customer_reviews.text: this purse will surprise you with how much room is in it,,,,,,,,,,,,,,various zipper compartments will allow you to carry all your needed supplies and it looks great,,,,,,,,,,,,,strap adjustable to just where you want it,,,,,,,,,,,,a must have for your collection
customer_reviews.author: d a crim

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Stinky
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag and seems to be well made but it STINKS! You know that smell that genuine leather products have? It's not unpleasant. Well, imagine that times 1,000! It's nauseating and makes my eyes water and my nose run. I'm going to try leaving it out in the sun for a few days but if the stink remains, this is getting tossed. I thought it would lessen after I took it out of the plastic bag and let it sit for a week but I wore it to work yesterday and coworkers were commenting about that smell. They must have sprayed something on it to make it smell more leathery. It's a shame because otherwise it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Drivers License
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to take on vacation. My 'normal" purse has everything from lotion, make-up, Tide Touch-up, sanitizer, band-aids, nail file, etc. and weighs a ton. Always be prepared. LOL! I needed something small(er) for basic necessities. Perfect for Drivers License, credit card(s), cash, lipstick, Passport, phone. That's all I need to take with me for Flight/dinner/sightseeing. Plenty of room for everything. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Strong Odor can NOT use.
customer_reviews.text: I had to give it at least one star in order to write a review, but this is terrible, the chemical smell is so strong and bad that as soon as I opened the box I had to seal it right back up immediately. The bag is smaller then expected but again as I said the chemical odor is just so strong there is no way even if you wanted a small bag you could use this one. Terrible Terrible Odor.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse! I had one sort of like this and when it finally wore out, I bought this to replace it. This one is better that my former favorite. There is a pocket on the purse that your phone will fit in perfect. Overall very pleased with this purse.
customer_reviews.author: Karan

customer_reviews.title: Too badthe desogn is poor
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what I was looking for, however the design is just slightly too poor to make it really functional. It's just a little undersized compared to similar other bags. V slots for credit cards are too small to fit your cards in. The pockets are just a little too small to be useful. I returned it and got a different bag thats the right size and also Anti-Theft.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen V

customer_reviews.title: JUST RIGHT BAG!
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my needs. I don't use a large bag because I walk with a cane and I can just sling this one on and be comfortable and feel balanced. I love the little rounded "wallet" on the front because it keeps my license and credit cards separate and easy to get to. The central zip compartment is large enough for a checkbook or other larger items and the smaller zips, for cosmetics. All in all, it works for me and I'm buying another one. I currently have the black.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Mcelveen

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this purse
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse! It's small and easy to carry, has a ton of pockets and the outer pocket has slots sewn in to hold your cards! It's fantastic. You do have to pick and choose what you carry, because the purse starts looking bulky quickly, but that just keeps it light. The leather is a good quality and all the zippers are easy to use. The outside pocket on the back doesn't have a zipper and is perfect for slipping my keys or phone into.
customer_reviews.author: JZvisuals

customer_reviews.title: Great little purse and will order again...if it ever wears out. It still looks like new!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to "downsize" my purse. Who needs a burdensome load strapped to themselves for hours each day? I refuse to carry more than it will hold. The back compartment holds a long security wallet; the two front hold my cell phone and spare glasses; I put bills, change, debit card and grocery lists in the small front compartment. The back pocket holds my (yeah, bad habit) cigarettes and lighter. It's easy to access whatever I need. The zippers seem to be well made and have heavy duty pull tabs. I'm not easy on this purse and I'm constantly in and out of it. It's holding up very well. It's not getting scuffed or showing any signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in price but not quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect crossbody bag, and definitely genuine leather. Just the right size - not too big or too small. I can easily carry my phone, my power pack charger and cord, plus the usual items like money/couple of credit cards, lip gloss, gum, car keys, etc. My dog chewed up my first one and I immediately got online and purchased a new one. Cannot beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: 6footSarah

customer_reviews.title: Leather not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the purse pictured. It is not soft smooth leather or color as pictured. It is configured as shown but is pebbled type leather and very stiff. I already have the black one and like it very well. I will keep it as it is functional but was unhappy that it's not the same as pictured. Unable to upload picture...sorry
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH WORLEY

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: I like this little bag a lot. The burgundy color I ordered is exactly what I wanted. It arrived promptly and I was able to use it right away to go on a trip. It is small but, with all the pockets, it has what I need to carry my ID, passport, money, lipstick and other essentials. When needed, I can even manage to squeeze my iPad mini (but nothing else) in the larger pocket The price can't be beat for this very good purchase, even if I wish it was a tad larger and the leather somewhat softer, which I believe will improve with use.
customer_reviews.author: Mico0994

product_meta.title: Roma Leathers Genuine Cross Body Purse Bag, Multi-Pocket
product_meta.description:
Meticulously crafted genuine lambskin leather crossbody bag has an abundance of organizational pockets, This stylish cross body bags is the perfect everyday travel purse. At a small size it is easy to carry around. Yet with five assorted sized zippered pockets to hold all of your things. Both front and back pockets are handy for quick access to your cash, phone, lip gloss and keys while an adjustable strap allows easy transitions from shoulder to crossbody styles




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :7 x 1.5 x 9 inches; 0.64 Ounces
 * Item model number :#1007
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :June 20, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Genuine Leather Multi-Pocket Crossbody Purse Bag (Black)
 * ASIN :B008D2N4GO

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #24,355 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #65 inWomen's Crossbody Handbags 
    *  #12329 inWomen's Shops

At a small size it is easy to carry around. Yet with five assorted sized zippered pockets to hold all of your things. Both front and back pockets are handy for quick access to your cash, phone, lip gloss and keys while an adjustable strap allows easy transitions from shoulder to crossbody styles
feature_bullets: Zip Around Pocket Organizer - Like having a Built-in-Wallet!
4 Exterior Zip Pockets, Back Slip Pocket great for stowing your smartphone
Adjustable Shoulder Strap - Goes from Crossbody to Short Shoulder - drop length up to 27"

specifications.Manufacturer: Genuine Leather Multi-Pocket Crossbody Purse Bag (Black)
